# GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/subscriptionLocalizations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/subscriptionLocalizations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-subscriptionLocalizations)

-  GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/subscriptionLocalizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/subscriptionLocalizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-subscriptionLocalizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/subscriptionLocalizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-subscriptionLocalizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-subscriptionLocalizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-subscriptionLocalizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionSubscriptionLocalizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionsubscriptionlocalizationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-subscriptionLocalizations#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-subscriptionLocalizations#Endpoints)

[`List All Localizations for an Auto-Renewable Subscription`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-subscriptionlocalizations)Get a list of the subscription localizations for a specific auto-renewable subscription.[`Read Subscription Localization Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionlocalizations-_id_)Get the specific localized metadata for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Create a Subscription Localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptionlocalizations)Create a localized display name and description for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Modify a Subscription Localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-subscriptionlocalizations-_id_)Update a specific localized subscription display name and description for an auto-renewable subscription.[`Delete a Subscription Localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-subscriptionlocalizations-_id_)Delete localized metadata that you configured for an auto-renewable subscription.
